en: Take photos using your camera, and they will appear here!
Are you sure you want to quit? Any unsaved progress will be lost.
Garbage bag is full. Press [button] to throw it!
Welcome to [game_name], your cozy autumn cleaning simulator! Your goal is to sweep all of the fallen leaves on the level. Use [WASD] to move, and [MOUSE] to look around.
Hold [LMB] to sweep! You receive money for sweeping, which you can later use to buy more powerful brooms and other upgrades.
You can press [F] to highlight leaves left on the map. Useful if you have missed a spot!
There are other ways to clean leaves other than using your broom, such as jumping, running and using objects in the environment. Try to experiment!
At the end of the level you receive a grade based on your speed and what techniques you have used. Aim for that maximum, golden S rank!
